Fenix.name: Plasma Cutter
Fenix.description: Create a laser beam at the target point that circles around Fenix twice, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and Slowing them by 25% for 4 seconds.

Fenix.name: Weapon Modes
Fenix.description: Activate to change between Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon and Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb.  Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon: Basic Attack speed increased by 150%.  Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb: Basic Attacks have 1.25 increased range, deal 25% more damage, and splash to nearby enemies.

Fenix.name: Warp
Fenix.description: Warp to a targeted location, phasing out after 0.5 seconds, and arriving 0.75 seconds later.

Fenix.name: Purification Salvo
Fenix.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 86 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

Fenix.name: Planet Cracker
Fenix.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

Fenix.name: Shield Capacitor
Fenix.description: Fenix has a permanent 760 (+4% per level) Shield which regenerates at 76 (+4% per level) per second after not taking damage for 5 seconds.

1.name: Advanced Targeting
1.description: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

1.name: Arsenal Synergy
1.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

1.name: Mobile Offense
1.description: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

4.name: Target Acquired
4.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

4.name: Inhibiting Energy
4.description: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes Slowed by Plasma Cutter Slow all enemies in the area by 35% for 4 seconds.

4.name: Emergency Protocol
4.description: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

7.name: Combat Advantage
7.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

7.name: Warp Warfare
7.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode.

7.name: Divert Power: Weapons
7.description: Activate to instantly drain Shield Capacitor's Shield, but increase Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds proportionate to the amount of Shields drained, up to an 80% increase.

10.name: Purification Salvo
10.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 86 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

10.name: Planet Cracker
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

13.name: Adanium Shell
13.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Dampening Field
13.description: Fenix gains 20 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

13.name: Rapid Recharge
13.description: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

13.name: Auxiliary Shields
13.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 10% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 20%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Offensive Cadence
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Photonic Weaponry
16.description: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

16.name: Arsenal Overcharge
16.description: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Secondary Fire
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 86 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

20.name: Singularity Charge
20.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.

20.name: Unconquered Spirit
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.
